DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess efficacy single dose level AF-219 female subject moderate severe pain associate interstitial cystitis/bladder pain syndrome ( IC/BPS ) 4 week treatment .
DOC.brief_title: The Safety Efficacy AF-219 Female Subjects With Interstitial Cystitis /Bladder Pain Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: This study double-blind , placebo-controlled , randomized trial design assess efficacy safety single dose level AF-219 female subject moderate severe IC/BPS . The study consist 4 phase : Screening , Baseline , Treatment , Follow-up .
